entry.title: Segnet4
entry.summary: The author of the message is pleased to announce a new Segwit testnet called segnet4. The new testnet supports activation via BIP9 and also supports BIP68, BIP112, and BIP113. The testnet now allows support for Lightning Network app development and collaboration. The author encourages everyone to spin up a node and try it out. For the source code, interested individuals can visit sipa's Github repository. Feedback is welcome through the provided channels.
